item.title: Deep Research And More From New AI Models
item.description: Based on the advice of Ethan Mollick on One Useful Thing, this foray into new deep research functionality shows how AI has evolved over the past year.

item.title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ HFR With TrueCut Motion Is Exclusive To China
item.description: If you are a fan of high frame rate you will be disappointed that only China is getting a TrueCut Motion version of Jurassic World Rebirth.
